page.title: 12A Visit to the Dentist.
page.content: If you go to the dentist you usually make an appointment.First I had to wait in the waiting room until I was called into the surgery.There was a big chair to sit in.The dentist can make it go up and down.He has lots of instruments;some of them are called probes.I had to have a filling because my tooth had decayed.First he gave me an injection.I felt a slight prick and then my lips felt cold.The nurse held an instrument called an aspirator in my mouth.This made my mouth go dry. Then the dentist squirted the hole with air.This made sure that the tooth was dry as he drilled out the decay. Then the nurse mixed some silver in a special machine.This was to fill the hole.When the hole was filled he asked me to bite my teeth together.I could not feel the filling which meant that it was level.Then it was soon over.
